name: King of Joseon Quiz Game
description: It is a quiz-style game about the king of Joseon, especially King Sejong. You can move the king by pressing the keys up, down, left, and right on the keyboard, and when the king touches the upper side of the yellow square box at the bottom of the game window, it pops up whether the answer is correct or wrong. If the answer is incorrect, you can try again by pressing the Enter key on your keyboard.
